A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has great visuals and if your looking for a good action sci-fi you will love this movie HOWEVER if you are looking for a great STAR WARS movie look else where this movies give no thought to any previous Star Wars movie when creating a story or shape it's character in fact this movie spits straight into the face of George Lucas and any  Star Wars fan looking for Star Wars movie a true stain on the franchise.
